experience.title: Microsoft Intern Engage 2022
experience.description: - Developed a restaurant and customer management browser-based application using facial recognition technology.- Here we integrated restaurant cameras with the web app to face recognize customers so that they can have a personalized experience right from check-ins, orders, and check-outs to making things easier for restaurants to manage as well.- Deployed the live-streaming server for WebRTC (Aiortc) and token management server for Django using Heroku.- Serialized the data and implemented REST API methods to get, and post the data.- Followed agile(scrum) methodology while developing the application.
experience.description_html: - Developed a restaurant and customer management browser-based application using facial recognition technology.- Here we integrated restaurant cameras with the web app to face recognize customers so that they can have a personalized experience right from check-ins, orders, and check-outs to making things easier for restaurants to manage as well.- Deployed the live-streaming server for WebRTC (Aiortc) and token management server for Django using Heroku.- Serialized the data and implemented REST API methods to get, and post the data.- Followed agile(scrum) methodology while developing the application.

recommendations: Aatish K. “I rarely come across real talents who stand out like Sadhvika. Always passionate about learning and is a self-motivated person. “Curious learner” is the trait that comes to my mind when I think about her. Sadhvika is a perceptive, quick individual with a high aptitude for implementing solutions. The project completed by her was executed by utmost perfection till the last effort to deliver an impressive application from all fronts. It is a pleasure to work with her. Above all, she is a smart person with a rare combination of creativity, sincerity, adaptivity, and good software skills. In my opinion, Sadhvika would be a true asset to any software team and comes with my heartfelt recommendation.”

volunteer_experience.info: • Engaged in NCC training focused on leadership, discipline, and civic duty.• Participated in drills, physical training, and skill-building exercises for teamwork and resilience.• Led social service initiatives, including blood donation camp to support community welfare.• Built a foundation in responsibility and national service, fostering commitment to societal betterment.

projects: [{"title":"Color Palette Generator","start_date":"Jun 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"A Python based program built to generate color palettes. I used the PyQt5 module to build the GUI and to create graphical applications. To generate the same shade palettes, I used the library Seaborn while for generating palette from image, I used K-means clustering algorithm provided by Sci-kit learn."}]
